channel.title: About on Coding with Data
channel.description: Recent content in About on Coding with Data

item.title: About
item.description: I am a self-employed Data Scientist available for consulting on data analytics projects. My main area of expertise is digital analytics, however I have worked on projects in a variety of industries such as online media, e-commerce, travel and banking. I love solving business problems with data, discovering new insights and building scalable solutions. While I do have a slight preference for R, I am also familiar with SQL, Python and Apache Spark.
